property.name: createQuotaTriggerQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.last_triggered_storage_quota ( storage_id, quota_value, quota_type, actions, recipients, update_date, target_status, status_activation_date, notification_required ) VALUES ( :STORAGE_ID, :QUOTA_VALUE, :QUOTA_TYPE, to_jsonb(:ACTIONS::jsonb), to_jsonb(:RECIPIENTS::jsonb), :UPDATE_DATE, :TARGET_STATUS, :STATUS_ACTIVATION_DATE, :NOTIFICATION_REQUIRED )

property.name: updateQuotaTriggerQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.last_triggered_storage_quota SET quota_value = :QUOTA_VALUE, quota_type = :QUOTA_TYPE, actions = to_jsonb(:ACTIONS::jsonb), recipients = to_jsonb(:RECIPIENTS::jsonb), update_date = :UPDATE_DATE, target_status = :TARGET_STATUS, status_activation_date = :STATUS_ACTIVATION_DATE, notification_required = :NOTIFICATION_REQUIRED WHERE storage_id = :STORAGE_ID

property.name: findQuotaTriggerQuery
property.value: SELECT storage_id, quota_value, quota_type, actions, recipients, update_date, target_status, status_activation_date, notification_required FROM pipeline.last_triggered_storage_quota WHERE storage_id = :STORAGE_ID

property.name: loadAllQuotaTriggersQuery
property.value: SELECT storage_id, quota_value, quota_type, actions, recipients, update_date, target_status, status_activation_date, notification_required FROM pipeline.last_triggered_storage_quota
